_comments.mcp_server_url: Required: URL of the OneSearch MCP server
_comments.skill_root_path: Optional: Absolute path to skill root directory. Set this when using as a global skill. If null, auto-detects from script location.
_comments.example_global: For global skill: set to '/Users/you/.claude/skills/one-search' or 'C:\\Users\\You\\.claude\\skills\\one-search'
